definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Welcome to SquidCraft, Face the challenges presented to you to become the winner.
